title: R1+Sonnet Sets State-of-the-Art on Polyglot Benchmark
description: Aider announced that the R1+Sonnet model combination achieved state-of-the-art performance on their challenging polyglot benchmark, which tests across 6 programming languages (C++, Go, Java, JavaScript, Python, Rust) using 225 difficult Exercism exercises.

community_feedback.quote: The new polyglot benchmark is much more challenging than the old code editing leaderboard and represents a significant shift in how AI coding assistants are evaluated.
Community discussions show Aider as one of the best terminal-based AI pair programmers in 2025, with strong multi-language support.

title: General Availability Launch and Model Deprecation Announcements
description: Claude Code reached General Availability status in January 2025, marking its transition from beta to full release. Anthropic also announced the deprecation of Claude 2, Claude 2.1, and Claude Sonnet 3 models as part of the transition to newer, more capable models.

title: January 2025 Product Update with Repository Management and Multi-File Editing
description: Cognition Labs released a January 2025 product update focusing on better repository management, deeper codebase understanding, and enhanced multi-file editing capabilities to improve Devin's ability to reason in context within repositories and find all relevant files that need editing.
